Others: Kuwait and India played a scoreless draw in the FIFA World Cup 2026 qualifiers at Salt Lake Stadium in Kolkata, West Bengal.
This was Sunil Chhetri’s final game in international colors.
India’s hopes of advancing to the third round of the FIFA World Cup Qualifiers look slim.
Kuwait needs to beat Afghanistan to ensure qualification.
South Korea thrashed Singapore 7-0, advancing to the final round of Asian qualifying for the 2026 World Cup.
China still has work to do after a 1-1 draw with Thailand.
Australia, Japan, and Iraq had already qualified and maintained their perfect records.
